description: Gets operating information about a wireless gateway.

parameters.name: WirelessGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the wireless gateway for which to get the data.

nested_items.name: WirelessGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: LastUplinkReceivedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the most recent uplink was received.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: The connection status of the wireless gateway.
